Sentencas: In this paper La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta cathode and Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-alpha electrolyte materials were synthesized by using a glycine-nitrate combustion (GNC) technique whereas La0.9Sr0.1MnO3-delta and La0.9Sr0.1Mn0.7Fe0.3O3-delta cathode materials were synthesized according to the Pechini method.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrochemical characterization of pure and composite cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The structures of all the cathode materials are perovskite type and their particle sizes are around 300 nm (for samples prepared by the GNC technique) and around 150-200 nm (for samples prepared by the Pechini method).
Titulo: Synthesis and electrochemical characterization of pure and composite cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Pure La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta, La0.9Sr0.1Mn0.7Fe0.3O3-delta and composite La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta/Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-alpha, La0.9Sr0.1MnO3-delta - 8 mol % yttria stabilized
Titulo: Synthesis and electrochemical characterization of pure and composite cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: zirconia (LSM/YSZ) cathodes were fabricated by screen printing methods.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrochemical characterization of pure and composite cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The morphologies of the cathodes were studied by scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrochemical characterization of pure and composite cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The resistances of the cathodes were evaluated by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy and galvanostatic current interruption techniques.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrochemical characterization of pure and composite cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Both techniques gave identical results in evaluating the total polarization resistance of the cathodes.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrochemical characterization of pure and composite cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Preparing a composite La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta/Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-alpha cathode at lower temperatures is an effective way to improve the electrochemical kinetics of IT-SOFC cathodes.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrochemical characterization of pure and composite cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The apparent activation energy of the composite La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta/Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-alpha cathode is 41 KJ.mol(-1), less than that of pure La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta cathode (51 - 59 kJ.mol(-1)).
Titulo: Synthesis and electrochemical characterization of pure and composite cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the total polarization resistances of composite LSM/YSZ cathodes are about one fifth of those of La0.9Sr0.1Mn0.7Fe0.3O3-delta cathodes.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrochemical characterization of pure and composite cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The total polarization resistances of the composite LSM/YSZ cathodes at 850degreesC and 800degreesC are smaller than those of pure LSMF cathodes at 950degreesC and 900degreesC, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrochemical characterization of pure and composite cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells
